statements: SELECT * FROM baseball_roster;
SELECT player_name, position, salary FROM baseball_roster;
SELECT player_name, position, salary FROM baseball_roster WHERE position = 'Pitcher';
SELECT player_name, position, salary FROM baseball_roster ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT player_name, position, salary FROM baseball_roster WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT player_name, position, salary FROM baseball_roster WHERE salary > 100000 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, salary, position FROM baseball_roster WHERE position = 'Pitcher' ORDER BY salary DESC, player_name ASC;
SELECT position, COUNT(*) AS num_players FROM baseball_roster GROUP BY position HAVING num_players > 2 ORDER BY num_players DESC;
SELECT player_name, salary FROM baseball_roster WHERE salary < 90000 OR position = 'Catcher' ORDER BY salary ASC;
SELECT player_name, salary FROM baseball_roster WHERE salary BETWEEN 80000 AND 120000 ORDER BY salary DESC, player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE position = 'QB';
SELECT player_name, position FROM players WHERE salary > 100000;
SELECT player_name, salary FROM players ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT player_name, position, salary FROM players WHERE salary BETWEEN 50000 AND 80000;
SELECT player_name, salary FROM players WHERE position IN ('RB', 'WR', 'TE') ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, position FROM players WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT player_name, position, salary FROM players WHERE position = 'Forward' ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT player_name, position, salary FROM players WHERE position = 'Guard' ORDER BY salary ASC;
SELECT player_name, salary, team_id FROM players JOIN team_roster ON players.id = team_roster.player_id WHERE salary BETWEEN 60000 AND 80000;
SELECT team_id, COUNT(player_id) AS total_players FROM team_roster GROUP BY team_id HAVING COUNT(player_id) > 3;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_position, player_salary FROM players WHERE player_position = 'Forward';
SELECT coach_name, coach_position FROM coaches WHERE coach_salary > 50000 ORDER BY coach_salary DESC;
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_city FROM teams WHERE team_city = 'New York' ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, player_salary FROM players WHERE player_salary < 70000;
SELECT coach_name, coach_position FROM coaches WHERE coach_position = 'Head Coach';
SELECT player_name, player_position FROM players WHERE player_salary > 50000 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_city FROM teams WHERE team_city = 'New York' ORDER BY team_name;
SELECT coach_name, coach_position, coach_salary FROM coaches WHERE coach_salary < 70000 ORDER BY coach_position;
SELECT player_name, player_position, player_salary FROM players WHERE player_position = 'Forward' ORDER BY player_salary DESC, player_name;
SELECT coach_name, coach_position, coach_salary FROM coaches WHERE coach_position IN ('Head Coach', 'Assistant Coach') ORDER BY coach_salary DESC;
SELECT player_name, position FROM player WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT team_name FROM team WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM player JOIN contract ON player.player_id = contract.player_id JOIN team ON contract.team_id = team.team_id WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM contract WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01' OR end_date IS NULL;
SELECT position_name, COUNT(*) as total_players FROM position JOIN player ON position.position_id = player.position GROUP BY position_name ORDER BY total_players DESC;
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_name, position FROM player WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT player_name, salary FROM player ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM player JOIN contract ON player.player_id = contract.player_id JOIN team ON contract.team_id = team.team_id;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(player_id) AS total_players FROM contract JOIN team ON contract.team_id = team.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, position FROM players WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT player_name, salary FROM players ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT team_name, city, mascot FROM teams WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT player_name, position, salary FROM players
SELECT team_name, city, mascot FROM teams
SELECT player_name, position, salary, team_name, city, mascot FROM players INNER JOIN contracts ON players.player_id = contracts.player_id INNER JOIN teams ON teams.team_id = contracts.team_id
SELECT player_name, position, salary FROM players WHERE salary > 1000000 ORDER BY salary DESC
SELECT player_name, player_id, injury_type, injury_date FROM players LEFT JOIN injuries ON players.player_id = injuries.player_id
